data.title: Lunar eclipse in Silapathar on December 11, 2057 (India)
data.meta_description: Information on the partial lunar eclipse of December 11, 2057 in Silapathar, with information on the times, magnitude of umbra and penumbra and height of the moon to see the lunar eclipse.
data.text:
Lunar eclipse on December 11, 2057

Complete information with all the data and schedules necessary to be able to observe the lunar eclipse of December 11, 2057 from Silapathar (India), where it will be seen as a partial lunar eclipse.

Tú navegador no soporta HTML5 canvas.

Penumbral StartPartial StartMaximumPartial EndPenumbral End

Penumbra magnitude: 2.018

Umbra magnitude: 0.918

The start and end times of contact with the penumbra are reported only for academic interests, since these events are never visible to the naked eye.

Event times are displayed in local time, UTC +5.5 is being used. Daylight Saving Time (DST) is not taken into account, one hour must be added if applicable.

The eclipse will begin at 03:22, the time at which the moon will enter the terrestrial penumbra. At that time the moon will be at a height of +30° with respect to the horizon.

The partial eclipse will begin at 04:40, when the moon will make contact with the umbra. At that time the moon will be at a height of +14°.

Maximum concealment will occur at 06:22. The height of the moon at that time will be -06°.

The partial eclipse will end at 08:04. Time when the moon will be at a height of -24°.

The eclipse will end at 09:21 when the moon rises from the gloom of the earth. It will be at a height of -35°.

The data in red indicate that at that time the eclipse is not visible from Silapathar. It usually happens because the moon is below the horizon.

Where can the eclipse be seen?

If you want to see the places where this lunar eclipse will be visible, you can do it on the page with the eclipse visibility map: (UTC)

Lunar eclipse - December 10, 2057

As with solar eclipses, a very important factor to be able to observe the eclipse is the weather. You can check it:

Weather in Silapathar
